user_query: I want to surprise my family with some interesting facts about cats. Can you fetch me five cat facts in the 'eng' language? Moreover, I'm planning a trip to New York and I need to check the draw results for the New York Lottery games. Can you provide me with the draw results for all the games?

TaskList.description: Fetch five interesting facts about cats in English.
Check the draw results for all New York Lottery games.
